newsitem.title: CANADA: Dylex main holder to sell shrs at C$8.40.
newsitem.headline: Dylex main holder to sell shrs at C$8.40.

text.p: The main shareholder of retailer Dylex Ltd, composed of River Road Canada and Silverton International Fund, agreed on Friday to sell 9,974,303 shares for C$8.40 each to a syndicate headed by CIBC Wood Gundy.
The other syndicate members include Midland Walwyn Capital and Nesbitt Burns. River Road and Silverton are part of Greenwich, Conn.-based Paloma Partners.
Dylex shares were down 0.10 to 8.20 on the Toronto Stock Exchange today after being halted earlier for news of the transaction.
